about_the_game:
Step into the whimsical and perilous world of "Cracked"! Once a peaceful realm, Yolkshire has fallen under the rule of the mad King Egg, who now forces his citizens into dangerous and hilarious challenges. Choose from a wacky cast of egg characters, navigate through eggsquisite levels filled with treacherous traps, and race to the sizzling frying pan finish line. Dodge obstacles, collect hilarious power-ups and unleash egg-splosive attacks to outwit your opponents. Can you crack the code, survive the madness, and restore sunny-side-up days to Yolkshire Kingdom?

Features


  • Whimsical World: Explore the vibrant, cartoonish Yolkshire Kingdom with its quirky architecture and egg-shaped citizens.
  • Diverse Characters: Choose from various wacky egg characters, each with unique personalities and racing styles.
  • Eggsquisite Levels: Navigate through creatively designed levels filled with treacherous spikes, slippery oil spills, daring catapults, saws, lasers, and lava pits.
  • Combat Racing: Collect powerful and hilarious power-ups, launch egg-splosive attacks, and outwit your opponents in high-stakes races.
  • Single and Multiplayer Modes: Enjoy a solo adventure or challenge friends and online opponents in frantic multiplayer races filled with mayhem and laughter.
  • Engaging Story: Join the fight against the mad King Egg, survive his dangerous games, and help restore peace to Yolkshire Kingdom.
  • Humorous Gameplay: Experience the egg-citing adventure with a touch of humor, witty egg puns, and playful banter.

Wishlist "Cracked" on Steam now and join the egg-citing adventure today!

name: Cracked

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Cracked is a 2D racing platformer set in the whimsical and perilous world of Yolkshire. Navigate through levels filled with traps, race to the frying pan finish line, collect power-ups, and outwit opponents to restore sunny-side-up days to Yolkshire Kingdom.
